my_yield.title: My Yield
my_yield.subtitle: Track predicted and actual yields for your plots
my_yield.prediction_subtitle: Estimate your harvest using ML models
my_yield.actual_records_subtitle: Real harvest data from your farm
my_yield.start_recording: Start recording your cinnamon harvest yields
my_yield.add_first_record: Add your first yield record to track performance
my_yield.tree_input_description: Input data for individual trees to get AI-powered yield predictions
my_yield.click_add_tree_data: Click "Add Tree Data" below to collect measurements from 3 random trees for hybrid yield prediction.
my_yield.how_to_use_hybrid: How to Use Hybrid Yield Prediction:
my_yield.step_1_select_plot: 1. Select a plot with "HARVESTING" status from the dropdown above
my_yield.step_2_add_tree_data: 2. Click "Add Tree Data" to collect measurements from 3 random trees
my_yield.step_3_get_prediction: 3. Get AI-powered hybrid prediction combining tree and plot data
my_yield.benefit_2_combines: ‚Ä¢ Combines tree-level ML with plot-level analysis
my_yield.method_info: Method: Real Hybrid Model - Combines tree-level ML, plot-level ML, and agronomic formulas
my_yield.collection_message: You will now collect data for 3 random trees from "{{plotName}}". This data will be used to create a hybrid yield prediction combining tree-level and plot-level machine learning models.
my_yield.plot_age_message: This plot is {{age}} years old. Cinnamon trees must be at least 3 years old for bark harvesting. Please select a mature plot.
my_yield.no_farms_message: No farms found. Please create a farm first.
my_yield.select_farm_message: Choose a farm to view its plots:
my_yield.no_plots_message: No plots found in the selected farm. Please go to the Farm page to add plots to "{{farmName}}" first.
my_yield.select_plot_message: Choose a mature plot for hybrid yield prediction:
my_yield.found_plots_message: Found {{total}} total plots, but none have "HARVESTING" status. {{other}} plots have other statuses ({{statuses}}). Only plots ready for harvest can be used for yield prediction.
my_yield.check_tree_data: Please check your tree data and try again.
my_yield.prediction_summary:
Predicted Yield: {{yield}} kg
Yield/Hectare: {{perHa}} kg/ha
Confidence: {{confidence}}%
my_yield.please_select_plot: Please select a plot first before adding tree data.
my_yield.fill_stem_data: Please fill stem diameter and existing stems count.
my_yield.failed_save_tree: Failed to save tree data. Please try again.
my_yield.at_least_trees_required: At least 3 trees with valid data are required for hybrid prediction.
my_yield.enter_total_trees_plot: Please enter the total number of trees in the plot.
my_yield.total_less_than_sample: Total trees ({{total}}) cannot be less than sample trees ({{sample}}).
my_yield.tree_measurement_info: After entering the total trees, you'll collect detailed measurements from 3 random trees in your plot for accurate yield prediction.
my_yield.enter_total_trees_required: Please enter the total number of trees in the plot.
